name: United Kingdom
notes: Points-based system post-Brexit. High salary requirements. Strong tech sector especially in London. NHS healthcare.

visa_types.name: Skilled Worker Visa
visa_types.description: Main work visa for skilled professionals with job offer.
requirements: Minimum salary £26,200 or going rate (whichever higher)
tips: Shortage occupation list has lower salary threshold
Can switch employers with new sponsor

visa_types.name: Global Talent Visa
visa_types.description: For leaders and potential leaders in tech, science, arts, etc.
requirements: Endorsement from approved body (Tech Nation for tech)
Evidence of exceptional talent or promise
visa_types.path_to_pr: 3 years for exceptional talent, 5 for exceptional promise
tips: Tech Nation endorsement is rigorous but achievable

visa_types.name: High Potential Individual Visa
visa_types.description: For recent graduates of top global universities.
requirements: Graduated from eligible top university in last 5 years
visa_types.path_to_pr: Switch to Skilled Worker after finding job
tips: Good for job hunting in UK

visa_types.name: Student Visa
visa_types.description: Study at UK universities with post-study work options.
visa_types.path_to_pr: Graduate route (2-3 years) → Skilled Worker → ILR
tips: Graduate route gives 2 years post-study work
